doc:
Alexa Vega https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alexa_Vega 0 Alexa PenaVega (née Vega; August 27, 1988) is an American actress and singer. She is known for her role as Carmen Cortez in the Spy Kids film series and Shilo Wallace in the film Repo! The Genetic Opera (2008). In 2009, she starred as the title character Ruby Gallagher in the ABC Family series Ruby The Rockits. Alexa_PenaVega ( née_Vega ; August_27_,_1988 ) is an_American_actress_and_singer . She is_known for her_role as Carmen_Cortez in the_Spy_Kids_film_series and Shilo_Wallace in the_film Repo ! The_Genetic_Opera_(_2008_) . In 2009 , she starred as the_title_character_Ruby_Gallagher in the_ABC_Family_series_Ruby_ .
